posts.title: 5 Mistakes I Made, So You Won't Have To
posts.description: I decided to re-work one of my very first projects I ever coded; ShufflePlus. It's a web app that re-orders tracks in your Spotify playlist based on the sound of the tracks, to make your playlist feel more like a mix and less like a random collection of songs that you used to like.
